Changelog
=========

0.7 (2011-09-15)
----------------

- Update generic call and response handling to follow changes introduced
  by moving to Degree-based services for DAI proper. [raphael]


0.6 (2010-09-26)
----------------

- Initial release
   the version number (0.6) refers to the INCF.DAI service specification
   underlying this release - this is still very much work in progress
